EmailTemplate.subject: STARTING NOW: Increasing Your ROI Using Your EMS Billing Programs
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
STARTING NOW! Increasing your ROI Using your EMS Billing Programs
We hope you can attend!
JOIN LINK: http://tritech.ilinc.com/join/ccmcvmt HANDOUT LINK: http://www.tritechems.com/documents/2011_ROI-Webinar_Oct20.pdf DATE: October 20, 2011 TIME: 2 PM Eastern | 1 PM Central l Noon Mountain | 11 AM Pacific PRESENTER: Larry Cole and TJ Irby - both EMS Billing Service Experts AUDIO: Listen through your computer speakers or dial the toll free number on your screen when you login
Trouble Logging In? Call 800.799.4510 for the iLinc Support Team Help
Questions? Cheri Lane, Marketing Communications Manager 800-537-3927, ext. #6278 cheri.lane@tritech.com
